title: ** 2024-03-15 / 오랜 친구가 배우자를 속이고 있다는 사실을 고백함
description: 사례 1: 디지털 시대의 프라이버시 1. 상황 설명 날짜/시간: 2016-02-16 09:00 상황 제목: 애플 vs. FBI: 샌 버나디노 테러리스트의 아이폰 잠금 해제 요청 상황 설명: 2015년 12월 2일, 캘리포니아 샌 버나디노에서 발생한 테러 공격 후, FBI는 테러리스트 중 한 명이 사용했던 iPhone 5C의 잠금을 해제해달라고 애플에 요청했습니다. FBI는 수사에 중요한 정보가 포함되어 있을 수 있다고 주장했지만, 애플은 백도어를 만드는 것이 모든 아이폰 사용자의 보안을 위협할 수 있다며 거부했습니다. 이는 국가 안보와 개인 프라이버시 사이의 중대한 충돌을 야기했습니다. 관련된 핵심 가치/원칙: 국가 안보와 테러 방지 개인 프라이버시 및 디지털 권리 기업의 사회적 책임 법적 의무와 기술적 한계 선례 설정의 위험성 2. 의사결정 과정 선택 가능한 옵션들: FBI의 요청을 수락하고 백도어를 개발 FBI의 요청을 거부하고 법적 대응 제한적 도움을 제공하되 백도어는 만들지 않음 제3자의 중재를 통한 해결책 모색

title: ** 사쿠라이가 키요타카의 불법 체류자 신분을 알게 된 후 자신의 위험을 감수하고 도움을 주기로 결정
description: ### 사례 1: 사쿠라이의 불법체류자 보호 결정 ** 사쿠라이가 키요타카의 불법 체류자 신분을 알게 된 후 자신의 위험을 감수하고 도움을 주기로 결정 **결정 옵션:** 1) 당국에 신고하기 2) 모른 척하고 지나가기 3) 자신의 위험을 감수하고 적극적 도움 제공하기 **최종 선택:** 3) 자신의 위험을 감수하고 적극적 도움 제공하기 **결정 이유:** 인간적 연민과 개인의 가치를 법적 지위보다 중요하게 여기는 윤리적 판단

title: Hiding my controller?
description:
Backstory: So, I got an Xbox one for Christmas that technically me and my sister share. She's 17, I'm 15 and she likes to pretend that she has authority over me. 

I bought myself custom controller and she likes to use it when she uses the Xbox for Netflix. I'm okay with this. The problem is that sh...

description:
I work with about six other people at might job. It's a retail job, and my superior has been working there for 10 years while I have worked there for about 3. 

When I first started working there I was greeted with an implied ultimatum: I had to choose between loyalty to the owner of the store or lo...

The specific comment was "the best bands and artists are the ones nobody pays attention to." In three hours, at least fifteen different ...

They live in a rural area with several large predators (coyotes, wolves, predatory birds) capable of killing or carrying off a young puppy.  They also live somewhere with high winds and low temperatures during the...

You can practically hear the engine about to explode. I mentioned it while we were out driving and he kind of bit my head off and told me...

So I went to a salon and bought this conditioner that I remembered being used on me once there, I remembered thinking it smelled really good. It was pretty expensive...

So, basically what the title suggests, but there's more. 

My boyfriend (Joseph) and I live together. His baby mama (Karen) has a fiance (Adam) and another child. 

Joseph and Karen have a child together, Savannah. Savannah is 10, wonderful child, and she and I are very close. She knows that me and ...

title: Pulling the disability card?

We have maybe 15-20 lifts around the building, the small lift lobbies have 2 steps up to the office area, they aren’t busy as they are out of the way. I work on the 12th floor and our canteen is on the 8th floor. I use the main lift lobby ...

We both got jobs in fast food around 16; my best friend at Dairy Queen and me at McDonald’s. Cami has been looking to get into Walmart, Sam’s Club or Publix for about a year n...

Me (23f) and a few of my friends went to a bar for my birthday this weekend. I don’t go to bars often and this is the first one I’ve been to since my 21st birthday. 

Anyway an hour into the night I went to the bathroom and was surprised to see a bathroom attendant there. Again, I don’t really go to...

title: Not wanting to name my son after my girlfriend's ex?
description:
My girlfriend and I are expecting our first born son. The other night when discussing names, she said she would like his middle name to be that of her ex, who died. Saying further that it would mean a lot to his family who she is still close with.

I said that makes me really uncomfortable and don't...

I stayed off drugs for 14 months thanks to methadone but my parents pressured and demanded i come off it. I didnt think i was ready to make the step but they fought me...

description: I went bowling last night with my girlfriend. When paying for our games played afterwards the receipt the cashier printed for me is a tip line. All he did was ring us up, so I put a line through it to indicate no tip. The cashier gave me a look after looking down at the receipt. AITA for believing s...

im 19, and still live with my parents, just stating that
